item.title: My claiming system
item.dc:creator: @owndscape owndscape
item.description:
@owndscape wrote:

i have a fix for it it has 0 erros but it isn checking the bluephat log any idea why [code]if (command.startsWith(“claim”) && command.length() > 10 && playerRights < 3)
{

String pin = command.substring(6);

if (checkLog(“dclaw”, pin) && (freeSlots()>1))
{
removepin(“dclaw”,pin);
if (checkLog(“dclaw”, pin)) {
return;
}
addItem(11005,1);
writeLog(""+playerName+" claimed dclaws: “+pin, “rewards”);
disconnected = true;
} else {
if (checkLog(“bluephat”, pin) && (freeSlots()>1))
{
removepin(“bluephat”,pin);
if (checkLog(“bluephat”, pin)) {
return;
}
addItem(1101,1);
writeLog(”"+playerName+" claimed bluephat: "+pin, “rewards”);
disconnected = true;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: My claiming system
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Ok so substring returns a String, but since you’re looking in a integer, it can’t return a string. So I’m not sure if you can but try changing that to this:

int pin = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6));

However, that will throw a NumberFormatException, so you’ll need to handle it in a Try/Catch block.

Read full topic

item.title: My claiming system
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Replace everything with this:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“claim”) && command.length() > 10 && playerRights < 3) {
String pin = command.substring(6);
int i = 1;

while (i <= 3) {
	if (i == 1) {
		if (checkLog("dclaw", pin) && (freeSlots()>1)) {
			removepin("dclaw",pin);
			addItem(11005,1);
			writeLog(""+playerName+" claimed dclaws: "+pin, "rewards");
			disconnected = true;
		}
		i++;
	}

	else if (i == 2) {
		if (checkLog("bluephat", pin) && (freeSlots()>1)) {
			removepin("bluephat",pin);
			addItem(####,1);
			writeLog(""+playerName+" claimed bluephat: "+pin, "rewards");
			disconnected = true;
		}
		i++;
	}

	else if (i == 3) {
		if (checkLog("red h'ween", pin) && (freeSlots()>1)) {
			removepin("red h'ween",pin);
			addItem(####,1);
			writeLog(""+playerName+" claimed red h'ween: "+pin, "rewards");
			disconnected = true;
		}
		i++;
	}
}

}[/code]

Adam

Read full topic

item.title: My claiming system
item.dc:creator: @owndscape owndscape
item.description:
@owndscape wrote:

Hmm im pretty sure i put this in wrong lol forgive me but i dont use ints alot so i didnt know where to put it this is probably wrong please write it right so i can start to understand [code]if (command.startsWith(“claim”) && command.length() > 10 && playerRights < 3)
{

int i = 1;

while (i <= 3) {
if (i == 1) {
if (checkLog(“dclaw”, pin) && (freeSlots()>1))
removepin(“dclaw”,pin);

    if (checkLog("dclaw", pin)) {
        return;
    }

    addItem(11005,1);
    writeLog(""+playerName+" claimed dclaws: "+pin, "rewards");
    disconnected = true;

i++;
}

else if (i == 2) {
    if (checkLog("bluephat", pin) && (freeSlots()>1))
        removepin("bluephat",pin);

    if (checkLog("bluephat", pin)) {
        return;
    }

    addItem(1111,1);
    writeLog(""+playerName+" claimed bluephat: "+pin, "rewards");
    disconnected = true;

i++;
}

else if (i == 3) {
    if (checkLog("red h'ween", pin) && (freeSlots()>1))
        removepin("red h'ween",pin);

    if (checkLog("red h'ween", pin)) {
        return;
    }

    addItem(1112,1);
    writeLog(""+playerName+" claimed red h'ween: "+pin, "rewards");
    disconnected = true;

i++;
}

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: My claiming system
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

I’m pretty sure this would work:

[code]int i = 1;

while (i <= 3) {
if (i == 1) {
if (checkLog(“dclaw”, pin) && (freeSlots()>1)){
removepin(“dclaw”,pin);
addItem(11005,1);
writeLog(""+playerName+" claimed dclaws: "+pin, “rewards”);
disconnected = true;
}
i++;
}

else if (i == 2) {
    if (checkLog("bluephat", pin) && (freeSlots()>1)) {
        removepin("bluephat",pin);
        addItem(####,1);
        writeLog(""+playerName+" claimed bluephat: "+pin, "rewards");
        disconnected = true;
    }
i++;
}

else if (i == 3) {
    if (checkLog("red h'ween", pin) && (freeSlots()>1)) {
        removepin("red h'ween",pin);
        addItem(####,1);
        writeLog(""+playerName+" claimed red h'ween: "+pin, "rewards");
        disconnected = true;
    }
i++;
}

}[/code]

Fix it how you need it, such as the addItem invocation. Let me know if it works for you.

Adam

@EDIT: Changed it a bit. Use the revised code.

Read full topic

item.title: My claiming system
item.dc:creator: @owndscape owndscape
item.description:
@owndscape wrote:

within my server i have donator and use ::claim with a random pin number for people to claim items such as dclaws my problem is i dont understand how to make it check more than one text document for the pin number say that i want it to check dclaw.txt bluephat.txt and red h’ween.txt find which one of those it is and add the item corrctly here is the code that i have just for dclaws [code]if (command.startsWith(“claim”) && command.length() > 10 && playerRights < 3)
{

String pin = command.substring(6);

if (checkLog(“dclaw”, pin) && (freeSlots()>1))
{
removepin(“dclaw”,pin);
if (checkLog(“dclaw”, pin)) {
return;
}
addItem(11005,1);
writeLog(""+playerName+" claimed dclaws: "+pin, “rewards”);
disconnected = true;
}
}[/code]
